title: Photograph, "Album: Saylor's Coffee-ets"
description: The featured product, a can of Taylor's coffee-ets candy, is photographed in black and white in the center of the page against a shadowed background. The product name is encircles the can on two lines beginning just below the rim of the can, with Taylor's in a variation of stencil-style lettering and coffee-ets in a hand-lettered white type. The lower part of the can is imprinted in an allover pattern of coffee beans. On the rim, in a light color against a dark background, a foliate motif in the center is encircled by product copy imprinted in script.

tombstone.epitaph: Photograph, "Album: Saylor's Coffee-ets". 19 x 24 cm (7 1/2 x 9 1/2 in.). Gift of Ellen Gustav Jensen. 1956-47-84-h.
